metadata.title: CVE-2022-42799 on Ubuntu 24.04 LTS. (noble) - medium
metadata.description:
The issue was addressed with improved UI handling. This issue is fixed intvOS 16.1, macOS Ventura 13, watchOS 9.1, Safari 16.1, iOS 16.1 and iPadOS16. Visiting a malicious website may lead to user interface spoofing.

    Update Instructions:

    Run `sudo pro fix CVE-2022-42799` to fix the vulnerability. The problem can be corrected
    by updating your system to the following package versions:

gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.0 - 2.38.2-1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-4.1 - 2.38.2-1
gir1.2-javascriptcoregtk-6.0 - 2.38.2-1
gir1.2-webkit-6.0 - 2.38.2-1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.0 - 2.38.2-1
gir1.2-webkit2-4.1 - 2.38.2-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-18 - 2.38.2-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.0-bin - 2.38.2-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-4.1-0 - 2.38.2-1
libjavascriptcoregtk-6.0-1 - 2.38.2-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.0-37 - 2.38.2-1
libwebkit2gtk-4.1-0 - 2.38.2-1
libwebkitgtk-6.0-4 - 2.38.2-1
webkit2gtk-driver - 2.38.2-1
No subscription required

criterions.comment: webkit2gtk package in noble was vulnerable but has been fixed (note: '2.38.2-1').
qtwebkit-opensource-src package in noble is affected and may need fixing.
